title: (x) Beyond Good & Evil - ITC Berkeley (customized) {Mark S}
content:
Can anyone help me in trying to find out what font was used for the logo in the video game, Beyond Good & Evil?   
   
 ![Beyond Good & Evil logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518052112im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/25500.jpg)
author: ecosvaldo

comments.content: Looks like somebody's chopped up, stretched, and roughened [ITC Berkeley Oldstyle Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518052112/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-berkeley-old-style/itc-berkeley-oldstyle-bold/testdrive.html?s=BEYONDGOOD%26EVIL&p=48).
